CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do you want Ubiquity to locate addresses for and/or send certified notices to your ex-employee(s)?
CustomField.label: UBQTFindSendNotices

value.fullName: A) I want Ubiquity to locate my ex-employee(s) for me ($25 look up fee per employee) AND send my ex-employee(s) a notice ($10 fee per notice).
value.label: A) I want Ubiquity to locate my ex-employee(s) for me ($25 look up fee per employee) AND send my ex-employee(s) a notice ($10 fee per notice).

value.fullName: B) I want Ubiquity to send my ex-employee(s) a notice ($10 fee per notice) to the existing address already on Ubiquity's system.
value.label: B) I want Ubiquity to send my ex-employee(s) a notice ($10 fee per notice) to the existing address already on Ubiquity's system.

value.fullName: C) I (sponsor/trustee) will locate their last known address, update the information on Ubiquity's site if applicable and send the certified notice to my ex-employee(s) myself.
value.label: C) I (sponsor/trustee) will locate their last known address, update the information on Ubiquity's site if applicable and send the certified notice to my ex-employee(s) myself.
